text: Ekajana rasula, yini tomadera kache allahara suspasta ayatasamuha patha karena, yate bisbasi o satkarmaparayanadera andhakara theke alote anayana karena. Ye allahara prati bisbasa sthapana kare o satkarma sampadana kare, tini take dakhila karabena jannate, yara taladese nadi prabahita, tathaya tara cirakala thakabe. Allaha take uttama riyika debena.
